summary: A young department store intern falls in love with a female store mannequin who is really a peasant girl fallen under a thousand year spell. She comes to life whenever he removes the cursed necklace from her.
cast: Kristy Swanson|William Ragsdale|Meshach Taylor|Terry Kiser|Stuart Pankin|Cynthia Harris|Andrew Hill Newman|Julie Foreman|John Edmondson|Phil Latella|Mark Gray|Erick Weiss|Jackye Roberts|John Casino|Laurie Wing|Julie Warder|James Reed|Joanne Bradley|Christine Anne Baur|Allelon Ruggiero|Heather Henderson|Sherry Wallén|Thom Christopher Warren|Wendy Worthington|Jim Nital|Ilene Norris|Hazel Pierce|Robert Hines|Daphne Lynn Stacey|Eva Andell|Michael J. Anderson|Suzanne DeLaurentiis|Dana Dewes|Celeste Russi|Chris Giannini|Cocò|Ellen Sabino|Christine Vanacore|Michael Stermel|Jerry Lyden|John Richman|Rocky Cathcart|Joe Milazzo|Matt Myers|Bud Seese|Cliff McMullen|Nancy Nicholson|Dana Edward Schmidt|Ereina Valencia|Felise Bagley|Irene Schoener|Christa Catakoso|Bey Brown|Jennifer McDonough|Luis Torres|Jody Ellis|Jose Rodriquez|Kerry I. title: Atrapa a ese maniquí
